Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron used one of his arms to stabilize (I dont know how to spell this
one jeff, if your gonna tell me do it privately ;P) his cannon. He stood
sideways looking Autofire over. Over his years he always made sure to keep
track of every name that had joined his cause, but he had been inactive for
over 300 years, and this one may have joined after that. But then, he
remembered as Galvatron, he had heard the name. Galvatron once sent this
one to assasinate the Autobot leader. "You served the Decepticon cause
well, when you where under Galvatrons rule, and that is very comendable" he
said, obviously showing his distain for Galvatron. " I sensed your signal
was here, and came to revive you for your true destiny, as a Decepticon
ruler of this mudball" he said, liying through his fusion cannon (thats
just an expression).
